data: Mr. Davenport Dunn | Lady Augusta Arden
When Mr. Davenport Dunn entered the drawing-room before dinner on that day, his heart beat very quickly as he saw Lady Augusta Arden was there alone.
Davenport Dunn, a Man of Our Day. Volume 2
